Docs.summary: Returns the address to which the socket is connected.
Docs.value: the remote IP address to which this socket is connected, or null if the socket is not connected.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns an input stream for this socket.
Docs.value: an input stream for reading bytes from this socket.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while creating the input stream or the socket is in an invalid state.

Docs.summary: Returns the binding state of the socket.
Docs.value: true if the socket was successfuly bound to an address

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the closed state of the socket.
Docs.value: true if the socket has been closed

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the connection state of the socket.
Docs.value: true if the socket was successfuly connected to a server

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns whether the read-half of the socket connection is closed.
Docs.value: true if the input of the socket has been shutdown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns whether the write-half of the socket connection is closed.
Docs.value: true if the output of the socket has been shutdown

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.KeepAlive : bool with get, set
public virtual bool KeepAlive { get; set; }

Docs.param: whether or not to have socket keep alive turned on.
Docs.summary: Tests if SocketOptions#SO_KEEPALIVE SO_KEEPALIVE is enabled. -or- Enable/disable SocketOptions#SO_KEEPALIVE SO_KEEPALIVE.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating whether or not SocketOptions#SO_KEEPALIVE SO_KEEPALIVE is enabled.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Property setter documentation:
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the local address to which the socket is bound.
Docs.value: the local address to which the socket is bound, the loopback address if denied by the security manager, or the wildcard address if the socket is closed or not bound yet.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the local port number to which this socket is bound.
Docs.value: the local port number to which this socket is bound or -1 if the socket is not bound yet.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the address of the endpoint this socket is bound to.
Docs.value: a SocketAddress representing the local endpoint of this socket, or a SocketAddress representing the loopback address if denied by the security manager, or null if the socket is not bound yet.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.OOBInline : bool with get, set
public virtual bool OOBInline { get; set; }

Docs.param: true to enable SocketOptions#SO_OOBINLINE SO_OOBINLINE, false to disable.
Docs.summary:
Tests if SocketOptions#SO_OOBINLINE SO_OOBINLINE is enabled. -or- Enable/disable SocketOptions#SO_OOBINLINE SO_OOBINLINE (receipt of TCP urgent data)
By default, this option is disabled and TCP urgent data received on a socket is silently discarded.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating whether or not SocketOptions#SO_OOBINLINE SO_OOBINLINEis enabled.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Property setter documentation:
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns an output stream for this socket.
Docs.value: an output stream for writing bytes to this socket.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while creating the output stream or the socket is in an invalid state.

Docs.summary: Returns the remote port number to which this socket is connected.
Docs.value: the remote port number to which this socket is connected, or 0 if the socket is not connected yet.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ReceiveBufferSize : int with get, set
public virtual int ReceiveBufferSize { get; set; }

Docs.param: the size to which to set the receive buffer size. This value must be greater than 0.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the SocketOptions#SO_RCVBUF SO_RCVBUF option for this Socket, that is the buffer size used by the platform for input on this Socket. -or- Sets the SocketOptions#SO_RCVBUF SO_RCVBUF option to the specified value for this Socket.
Docs.value: the value of the SocketOptions#SO_RCVBUF SO_RCVBUF option for this Socket.

Property setter documentation:

Docs.value: a SocketAddress representing the remote endpoint of this socket, or null if it is not connected yet.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public virtual bool ReuseAddress { get; set; }

Docs.param: whether to enable or disable the socket option

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SendBufferSize : int with get, set
public virtual int SendBufferSize { get; set; }

Docs.param: the size to which to set the send buffer size. This value must be greater than 0.
Docs.summary: Get value of the SocketOptions#SO_SNDBUF SO_SNDBUF option for this Socket, that is the buffer size used by the platform for output on this Socket. -or- Sets the SocketOptions#SO_SNDBUF SO_SNDBUF option to the specified value for this Socket.
Docs.value: the value of the SocketOptions#SO_SNDBUF SO_SNDBUF option for this Socket.
